item.title: Cicada: 3301 TryHackMe Writeup
item.description:
In this room, we uncover hidden messages through steganographic methods and research.

Task 2: Analyze the Audio

Question: What is the link inside of the audio?

To solve this task, I used Sonic Visualizer to analyze the attached WAV file for hidden messages. I added a new spectrogram layer and zoomed in to reveal a QR code.  Scanning this QR code reveals a Pastebin link which is the answer for this task. Clicking on this link opens a text document with a passphrase and key. This information will be needed for the next task.
